name: arborize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of a nerve cell) to form a structure shaped like a tree: These cells arborize in two broad, poorly defined bands. The neurons arborise and send terminal projections into the superficial layers of the cortex. Related word
arborization
More examplesFewer examplesThese pyramidal axons arborize more densely. The ovarian interlobular arteries arborise extensively and form capillary networks.There were two bipolar cell types seen to arborize.Both offshoots further arborised in layer 9 where they gave rise to a complex plexus of varicose processes.
